QuestData.Title: The Inconsolable Chieftain
QuestData.Description: You have done so much for the Mag'har, $n. Your accomplishments are known to all, including Garrosh. Go to him now and tell him of your latest victory. Tell him that you do what you do for him and his people. Surely he will be lifted by your words.
QuestData.LogDescription: Greatmother Geyah at Garadar has asked that you speak with Garrosh.
QuestData.RewardText: Everyone is proud. Proud that our people will live to see another winter. But beyond that? What is there?$B$BMaybe you should lead this clan, $N. Maybe then I will be allowed to die when the Greatmother passes. Allowed to finally erase the shame of my family name. I long for such peace.
